requestParams.name: combine_params
requestParams.desc: 无规格组合商品组合明细，如：[{"related_combine_num":1000,"related_combine_price":12300,"related_combine_sku_id":7568911}]

children.name: related_combine_num
children.desc: 子商品 捆绑数量 支持三位小数，需放大1000倍传入

children.name: related_combine_price
children.desc: 子商品 价格 单位：分

children.name: related_combine_sku_id
children.desc: 组合商品子商品关联商品库商品id

requestParams.name: components_extra_id
requestParams.desc: 商品详情额外组件(固定值：-1)

requestParams.name: effective_delay_hours
requestParams.desc: 电子凭证自定义推迟时间

requestParams.name: effective_type
requestParams.desc: 电子凭证生效类型，0 立即生效， 1 自定义推迟时间， 2 隔天生效

requestParams.name: etd_days
requestParams.desc: 付款成功 后发货天数, 默认0。

requestParams.name: etd_start
requestParams.desc: 预计发货开始时间, 字符串格式的时间

requestParams.name: etd_type
requestParams.desc: 发货类型: 0, xxx 时间开始发货(默认), 1, 付款 n 天后发货

requestParams.name: goods_platform
requestParams.desc: 商品参与平台 0：普通商品 10：分销平台

requestParams.name: goods_type
requestParams.desc: 商品类型：0：普通商品，1: 拍卖商品, 3：ump降价拍，10:分销商品；20：会员卡商品；25：批发商品；30：收银台商品；35：酒店商品。

requestParams.name: hide_stock
requestParams.desc: 页面不显示商品库存: 0, 显示; 1, 不显示

requestParams.name: is_display
requestParams.desc:
是否上架
0：未发布，草稿状态（wap看不到） 1：发布 （正常状态）

requestParams.name: is_virtual
requestParams.desc: 是否虚拟商品，0否, 2 虚拟商品， 3 电子卡券

requestParams.name: item_sku_meas_props
requestParams.desc:
有sku规格情况下，
商品的计量属性

requestParams.name: item_validity_end
requestParams.desc: 虚拟商品有效期结束时间,1970-01-01 开始的秒数,留空表示长期有效

requestParams.name: item_validity_start
requestParams.desc: 虚拟商品有效期开始时间,1970-01-01 开始的秒数,留空表示长期有效

requestParams.name: item_weight
requestParams.desc: 商品重量, 无sku规格情况下使用

requestParams.name: join_level_discount
requestParams.desc: 是否参加会员折扣，默认：0 不参加

requestParams.name: price
requestParams.desc: 价格（多规格商品，商品价格不得小于各个规格价格），单位：分

requestParams.name: related_sku_id
requestParams.desc: 无规格网店商品关联商品库商品id

requestParams.name: sell_type
requestParams.desc: 销售类型 1单个销售 2 组合销售

requestParams.name: sold_time
requestParams.desc: 开卖时间: 0 立即开售, 1 定时开售

requestParams.name: stocks
requestParams.desc: 多规格商品库存信息，例如：[{"sku_id":0,"related_sku_id":2250523,"price":100,"sell_stock_count":0,"sold_num":0,"cost_price":null,"sku_no":"P171011010602432","name":"测绘0333","skus":[{"k":"颜色","v":"粉色","kid":1,"vid":40172}],"k1":"颜色","v1":"粉色"},{"sku_id":0,"related_sku_id":2250523,"price":100,"sell_stock_count":12,"sold_num":0,"cost_price":null,"sku_no":"P171010025662807","name":"测试删除2","skus":[{"k":"颜色","v":"红色","kid":1,"vid":1215}],"k1":"颜色","v1":"红色"}]

children.name: related_combine_num
children.desc: 子商品 捆绑数量 支持三位小数，需放大1000倍传入

children.name: related_combine_price
children.desc: 子商品 价格 单位：分

children.name: related_combine_sku_id
children.desc: 组合商品子商品关联商品库商品id

children.name: max_retail_price
children.desc: 多规格-最高建议零售价(分)

children.name: min_retail_price
children.desc: 多规格-最小建议零售价(分)

children.name: pre_related_sku_id
children.desc: 前一次关联的商品库商品id

children.name: related_sku_id
children.desc: 本次关联的商品库商品id

children.name: k
children.desc: 规格分类 值; eg: 颜色

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['components_extra_id']=-2
params['delivery_template_id']=0
params['effective_type']=0
params['etd_start']="2017-10-13"
params['etd_type']=0
params['goods_platform']=0
params['holidays_available']="true"
params['is_display']=1
params['is_virtual']=0
params['join_level_discount']=1
params['messages']="[]"
params['origin']="0"
params['picture']="[{"url":"https://img.yzcdn.cn/public_files/2017/08/30/63a8d28bce4ca2e5d081e1e69926288e.jpg"}]"
params['picture_height']=320
params['postage']=0
params['pre_sale']="true"
params['price']=100
params['purchase_right']="false"
params['quota']=0
params['sku_img_dict_id']=1
params['sku_img_dict_value']="颜色"
params['sku_img_urls']="[{"id":40172},{"id":1215}]"
params['sold_time']=0
params['source']="test"
params['stocks']="[{"sku_id":0,"related_sku_id":2250523,"price":100,"sell_stock_count":0,"sold_num":0,"cost_price":null,"sku_no":"P171011010602432","name":"测绘0333","skus":[{"k":"颜色","v":"粉色","kid":1,"vid":40172}],"k1":"颜色","v1":"粉色"},{"sku_id":0,"related_sku_id":2250523,"price":100,"sell_stock_count":12,"sold_num":0,"cost_price":null,"sku_no":"P171010025662807","name":"测试删除2","skus":[{"k":"颜色","v":"红色","kid":1,"vid":1215}],"k1":"颜色","v1":"红色"}]"
params['title']="测试网店商品"
params['total_stock']=1
params['ump_level']="[]"
params['ump_tags']="[]"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.product.online.create', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'-2', 'delivery_template_id' => '0', 'effective_type' => '0', 'etd_start' => '2017-10-13', 'etd_type' => '0', 'goods_platform' => '0', 'holidays_available' => 'true', 'is_display' => '1', 'is_virtual' => '0', 'join_level_discount' => '1', 'messages' => '[]', 'origin' => '0', 'picture' => '[{"url":"https://img.yzcdn.cn/public_files/2017/08/30/63a8d28bce4ca2e5d081e1e69926288e.jpg"}]', 'picture_height' => '320', 'postage' => '0', 'pre_sale' => 'true', 'price' => '100', 'purchase_right' => 'false', 'quota' => '0', 'sku_img_dict_id' => '1', 'sku_img_dict_value' => '颜色', 'sku_img_urls' => '[{"id":40172},{"id":1215}]', 'sold_time' => '0', 'source' => 'test', 'stocks' => '[{"sku_id":0,"related_sku_id":2250523,"price":100,"sell_stock_count":0,"sold_num":0,"cost_price":null,"sku_no":"P171011010602432","name":"测绘0333","skus":[{"k":"颜色","v":"粉色","kid":1,"vid":40172}],"k1":"颜色","v1":"粉色"},{"sku_id":0,"related_sku_id":2250523,"price":100,"sell_stock_count":12,"sold_num":0,"cost_price":null,"sku_no":"P171010025662807","name":"测试删除2","skus":[{"k":"颜色","v":"红色","kid":1,"vid":1215}],"k1":"颜色","v1":"红色"}]', 'title' => '测试网店商品', 'total_stock' => '1', 'ump_level' => '[]', 'ump_tags' => '[]', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';

3.0.0.errorResponseDemo: {"error_response":{"msg":"网店实物商品必须关联一个商品库商品","code":22150002}}

name: create
scenarios:
发布网店商品 
实物商品至少关联一个商品库商品，关联关系全量更新。
虚拟商品不需要关联商品库商品。
库存值统一使用实际库存值1000倍之后的数值
价格单位 分
